articles.author: Amit Malewar
articles.title: AstroSat detected milli-second burst in a new high magnetic field neutron star - Tech Explorist
articles.description: Understanding the intriguing extreme astrophysical conditions of magnetars.
articles.content: Magnetars are super-strong neutron stars with more powerful magnetic fields than Earth’s. Their magnetic fields decay, emitting high-energy radiation. One such magnetar, SGR J1830-0645, discovered in… [+2146 chars]
